entry.title: Friday night: Periods of rain. Low 8.
entry.summary: Periods of rain. Fog patches. Amount 10 mm. Wind south 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 overnight. Low 8. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Rain at times heavy. Temperature falling to plus 1 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Rain at times heavy. Fog patches dissipating in the afternoon. Amount 30 to 40 mm. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming north 20 gusting to 40 in the afternoon. Temperature falling to plus 1 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Freezing rain or rain. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Rain changing to freezing rain in the evening. Rainfall amount 2 to 4 mm. Wind becoming north 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the evening. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Friday 13 January 2023
